channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 轻点两下（或三下），你最喜欢的 iPhone 功能或应用程序就会出现。下面是你需要查看的 "设置 "菜单。
item.description:
Your favorite iPhone feature or app can be two (or three) taps away. Here's the place in your Settings menu you need to look. https://t.co/mPWHccYPGX https://t.co/mPWHccYPGX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 从蒙大拿州到佛蒙特州，对于依赖滑雪、冰雪节和狗拉雪橇的社区来说，异常温暖的冬天是痛苦的
item.description:
From Montana to Vermont, an unusually warm winter has proved painful for communities reliant on skiing, ice festivals and dog sledding https://t.co/z2GqZpd9OE pic.twitter.com/xBdk9eFG5E

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 当潮水转向时，它遵循的是曲线而不是直线，这就是为什么涨潮和退潮持续的时间比你想象的要长的原因
item.description:
When the tide turns, it follows a curve not a straight line, which is why high tide and low tide last longer than you'd expect https://t.co/wkvz8OMx30 https://t.co/wkvz8OMx30

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）正在推出它希望成为洗涤剂未来的产品：不含液体的方块。以下是您需要了解的有关这种被称为汰渍 evo 的白色编织方块的信息。
item.description:
Procter & Gamble is rolling out what it hopes will be the future of detergent: liquid-free squares. Here's what you need to know about the white-woven tiles known as Tide evo. https://t.co/UPs8Syf0ow https://t.co/UPs8Syf0ow

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 参议院通过了维持美国政府运作的半数拨款法案，从而使多个机构在本财年剩余时间内不再面临停摆的可能
item.description:
The Senate passed half of the funding bills to keep the U.S. government operating, taking a potential shutdown for several agencies off the table for the rest of the fiscal year https://t.co/pXlUNE5FHx https://t.co/pXlUNE5FHx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 下次给医生发邮件时，如果他们向你收取回复费用，请不要感到惊讶。
item.description:
The next time you send your doctor an email, don’t be surprised if they charge you a fee to answer. https://t.co/8gnAPmAfs6 pic.twitter.com/sJqSGtLdVG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 长期以来，在旧金山或纽约这样的城市工作，工人可以获得很大的薪酬优势。现在，大城市的优势正在缩小。
item.description:
Workers have long gotten a large salary advantage by working in a city like San Francisco or New York. That big-city premium is now shrinking. https://t.co/nIM7C6hb83 https://t.co/nIM7C6hb83

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: 经过内部调查，萨姆-奥特曼认为自己适合领导这家初创公司，因此他将重新加入 OpenAI 董事会。

item.title: 根据病毒式传播的 "意想不到的红色理论"，一抹令人惊讶的深红色是打造别致生活空间的秘诀。百万 TikTokers 会错了吗？
item.description:

item.title: 美国总统拜登表示，他将签署一项法案使其成为法律，该法案将有效禁止 TikTok 或迫使其出售，从而加速立法者阻止该应用的中国所有者访问美国用户数据的最新努力。"他说："如果他们通过法案，我会签署。
item.description:
President Biden said he would sign into law a bill that would effectively ban TikTok or force its sale, accelerating lawmakers’ latest push to block the app’s Chinese owners from accessing U.S. users’ data.

“If they pass it, I’ll sign it,” he said. https://t.co/jBeq27d18c

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 他们的决定将决定他们的生死，也将决定鲁比玛号能否得救。阅读我们的故事，来自 @drewhinshaw 和 @JoeWSJ：
item.description:
Their decisions would determine whether they would live or die and if the Rubymar could be saved.

item.title: 卢比马号是近半个世纪以来第一艘在冲突中沉没的民用货轮，以下是卢比马号上发生的不为人知的故事
item.description:
🧵 Here’s the untold story of what happened on board the Rubymar, the first civilian cargo ship to be sunk in conflict for almost half a century https://t.co/cDBR3LjzBr https://t.co/cDBR3LjzBr

item.title: 联邦监管机构最近批准了几家无人机送货公司更自由地飞行，导致几家零售商、餐馆和医疗保健系统在全美范围内拓展服务。
item.description:
Federal regulators recently granted several drone-delivery companies permission to fly more freely, leading several retailers, restaurants and healthcare systems to expand their services across the U.S. https://t.co/NthHs8aKLi https://t.co/NthHs8aKLi

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 摘自 @WSJopinion：布赖恩-里尔登写道：CTA 的裁决是美国公民隐私权的巨大胜利，也许是为允许政府收集哪些个人信息设定合理界限的更大斗争中的第一个标志。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The CTA ruling is a huge win for the privacy of American citizens and perhaps the first marker in the larger battle to set reasonable boundaries on what personal information the government is allowed to collect, writes Brian Reardon https://t.co/dSif3A5Jki

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 里奇-科恩不在乎影评人怎么说：在黯淡的 20 世纪 70 年代的美国，《洛奇》理应击败《出租车司机》，获得奥斯卡最佳影片奖
item.description:
Rich Cohen doesn't care what the film critics say: In a bleak 1970s America, "Rocky" deserved to beat "Taxi Driver" for the Best Picture Oscar https://t.co/PG522u3jeK https://t.co/PG522u3jeK

item.title: 国防部官员说，他们没有发现任何证据表明迄今为止目击到的不明飞行物是外星飞船。他们还得出结论，美国政府并没有掩盖外星人活动的存在。
item.description:
Defense Department officials said they found no evidence that any UFO sightings thus far have been extraterrestrial spacecraft. They also concluded the U.S. government didn’t engage in a coverup to hide the existence of alien activity. https://t.co/ynWKIgIrJ4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 洪都拉斯前总统胡安-奥兰多-埃尔南德斯因帮助向美国运送 500 多吨可卡因以换取数百万美元贿赂而被判有罪
item.description:
Former Honduran President Juan Orlando Hernández was found guilty of helping to ship more than 500 tons of cocaine into the U.S. in exchange for millions of dollars in bribes https://t.co/qZaTygK3JL https://t.co/qZaTygK3JL

item.title: 初步调查发现，科罗拉多州一位明星 DNA 科学家多年来一直在篡改证据，数百起刑事案件因此受到质疑
item.description:

item.title: 获得最佳男主角提名的保罗-吉亚玛提（Paul Giamatti）与美国职业棒球大联盟有一段鲜为人知的渊源：他的父亲就是禁止皮特-罗斯参赛的人。
